column1: Baga Beach is a popular beach and tourist destination in North Goa. Baga is located at the north end of the contiguous beach stretch that starts from Sinquerim
The beach contains rows of shacks and fishing boats
column2: and at high tide the beach is narrow.The beach is named after the Baga Creek
column3: which empties into the Arabian Sea at the north end of the beach.Baga Beach is also famous for water sports
column4: such as parasailing and banana rides
